full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @196A *, ,CES RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB THAMS CAD KYI GNANG BSDUS PA, SHING RTA CHEN PO KLU SGRUB DANG THOGS MED GNYIS KYIS LAM SROL, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I SAR BGROD PA'I SKYE BO MCHOG GI CHOS LUGS, SKYES BU GSUM GYI NYAMS SU BLANG BA'I RIM PA THAMS CAD TSANG BAR STON PA'I BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DGON PA PA NAS SNE'U ZUR BA LA BRGYUD PA DANG, SPYAN SNGA BA NAS BRGYUD PA GNYIS DANG, PO TO BA NAS SHA RA BA LA BRGYUD PA DANG, PO TO BA NAS DOL BA LA BRGYUD PA'I GDAMS NGAG BROS PA RNAMS KYI DON, LAM RIM RGYAS PA LAS SLAR YANG BSDUS PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG SBONG BA PA SHAR BZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS RI BO DGE LDAN DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,` MI MJED ZHING STON THUB DBANG SH'AKYA'I TOG ,BYAMS MGON 'JAM DPAL THOGS MED KLU SGRUB ZHABS, ,D'I BAm KA RA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG GRAGS, ,BLO BZANG RDO RJE CAN SOGS LA PHYAG 'TSAL, ,DE LAS BRGYUD PA'I RGYAL KUN SGROD GCIG PA'I, ,@196B MDOR 'DUS LAM GYI RIM PA'I PU STI KA ,NGAD STOBS LDAN PA RGYAL MTSAN KHVONG THA'I JIS, ,RGYAL BSTAN SBEL PHYIR LHAG BSAM DAG PA YIS, ,'DZAD MED CHOS SBYIN PAR DU LEGS BSGRUBS PA'I, ,RNAM DKAR 'DIS MTSON BDAG GZHAN DGE BA'I TSOGS, ,MCHIS SO STZAL KUN MA RNAMS SGROL BA'I PHYIR, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL DANG DE SRAS BCAS PA YIS, ,MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA'I BSNGO BA SMON LAM BZHIN, ,LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I RGYU RU SMON ZHING BSNGO, ,DE MTHUS SGRUB PO GTZOR GYUR 'DIR 'BAD PA'I, ,SKYE MGRO MA LUS PA NI THAMS CAD KYI, ,'GAL RKYEN KUN ZHI MTHUN RKYEN LHUN GYIS GRUB, ,SGRIB BYANG TSOGS RDZOGS KUN MKHYEN THOB GYUR CIG , ,,SHU BAm, ,TA'I CHING YUNG CANG RGYAL PO CHU MO BCU GCIG GLANG LO ZLA BA GNYIS YAR TSES LA,, ,,TSA HAN BLA MA LHA KHANG DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS,, ,,DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN BKA' BCU LHA KANG DU,, ,,YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL DGE LEGS 'BYUNG GNAS BRIS PA'O,, ,,DGE BAS 'GRO RNAMS SANGS RGYAS THOB PAR SHOG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O,, ,,
